name: Teferi, Time Raveler
description:
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.

+1: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.

−3: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

name: Tenth District Legionnaire
description:
Haste

Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tenth District Legionnaire, put a +1/+1 counter on Tenth District Legionnaire, then scry 1.

name: Time Wipe
description: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

name: Fist of Suns
description: You may pay [W][U][B][R][G] rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you cast.

name: Grappling Hook
description:
Equipped creature has double strike.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may have target creature block it this turn if able.

Equip [4]

name: Hedron Archive
description:
[Tap]: Add [Colorless][Colorless].

[2], [Tap], Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

name: Myr Superion
description: Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast Myr Superion.

name: Garruk Wildspeaker
description:
+1: Untap two target lands.

-1: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

-4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

name: Gilt-Leaf Ambush
description: Put two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield. Clash with an opponent. If you win, those creatures gain deathtouch until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of his or her library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if his or her card had a higher converted mana cost. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Mycosynth Golem
description:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

Artifact creature spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

name: Vivien Reid
description:
+1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

−3: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

−8: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance, trample, and indestructible."

name: Sai, Master Thopterist
description:
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

[1][U], Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.

name: Salvager of Secrets
description: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Scholar of Stars
description: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.

name: Sepulchral Primordial
description:
Intimidate

When Sepulchral Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Shadow Alley Denizen
description: Whenever another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

name: Shadow Slice
description:
Target opponent loses 3 life.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Slate Street Ruffian
description: Whenever Slate Street Ruffian becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.

name: Vivien, Champion of the Wilds
description:
You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.

+1: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gains vigilance and reach.

−2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. For as long as it remains exiled, you may look at that card and you may cast it if it's a creature card.

name: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord
description:
As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink.

+2: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

−X: Return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

name: Soul Diviner
description: [Tap], Remove a counter from an artifact, creature, land, or planeswalker you control: Draw a card.

name: Storrev, Devkarin Lich
description:
Trample

Whenever Storrev, Devkarin Lich deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return to your hand target creature or planeswalker card in your graveyard that wasn't put there this combat.

name: Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves
description:
When Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves enters the battlefield, create Voja, Friend to Elves, a legendary 3/3 green and white Wolf creature token.

Whenever a Wolf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life and that creature fights up to one target creature you don't control.

name: Tyrant's Scorn
description:
Choose one —

• Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
